      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10440130">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10440130">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10440130">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding More
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10440130">
          <p href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/aecontent.php?pid=353707&amp;sid=2893499">
           For recommendations beyond the core resources listed on this page, use the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357829&amp;sid=2950351">
            Finding Background Information
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357829&amp;sid=2950352">
            Finding Articles
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357829&amp;sid=2950353">
            Finding Books
           </a>
           , and
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357829&amp;sid=2950355">
            Citations
           </a>
           tabs across the top.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10440130" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10267887">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10267887">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10267887">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Additional Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content10267887">
          <p>
           Find specific recommendations by course:
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10267887" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link15196994">
              <a id="link_15196994" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/commpr" target="_blank" onclick="hit(15196994,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 15196994});">
               Communication &amp; Public Relations
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link25254026">
              <a id="link_25254026" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/crossgender" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25254026,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25254026});">
               Cross-Gender Performance in Media Culture
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12484786">
              <a id="link_12484786" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/filmanalysis" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12484786,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12484786});">
               Introduction to Film Analysis (Corbin)
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link18872077">
              <a id="link_18872077" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/mediaandsocialmovements" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18872077,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18872077});">
               Media &amp; Social Movements
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12484792">
              <a id="link_12484792" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/mediaindustries" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12484792,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12484792});">
               Media Industries
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link25251660">
              <a id="link_25251660" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/mediapanics" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25251660,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25251660});">
               Media Panics
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12484798">
              <a id="link_12484798" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/orgcomm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12484798,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12484798});">
               Organizational Communication
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10361126">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10361126">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10361126">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Resources for Finding Scholarly Articles and Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10361126">
          <div id="boxatt10361126" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12600190">
              <a id="link_12600190" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ufh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12600190,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12600190}); ">
               Communication and Mass Media Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and trade journals and books in media and communication and related areas. Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19008881">
              <a id="link_19008881" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=f3h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19008881,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19008881}); ">
               Film and Television Literature Index with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals, trade journals, books, and more in the areas of television and film.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12600198">
              <a id="link_12600198" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://online.sagepub.com/cgi/search" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12600198,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364850}); ">
               Sage Journals Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals published by Sage, providing wide coverage in all disciplines, but particularly the social sciences.  Full text for articles published 1999 to the present is linked directly in the database; otherwise, search the library catalog by journal titles to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24636769">
              <a id="link_24636769" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24636769,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24636766}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search finds information by searching through a massive collection of books and scholarly journals, as well as newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10452985">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10452985">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10452985">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Resources for Finding Popular Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10452985">
          <div id="boxatt10452985" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12705949">
              <a id="link_12705949" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12705949,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including media and communication. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12705952">
              <a id="link_12705952" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12705952,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369574}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12705950">
              <a id="link_12705950" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12705950,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364517}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly and non-scholarly journals covering various subjects including general sciences, humanities, social sciences, and business.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10361258">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10361258">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10361258">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Resources for Finding Background Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10361258">
          <div id="boxatt10361258" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12600207">
              <a id="link_12600207" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12600207,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas, including many notable titles for media and communication studies. Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706037">
              <b>
               Encyclopedia of Communication and Information
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 302.203 E56o vol. 1-3 (Level B)
               <br />
               In-depth entries on a variety of communication-related topics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706027">
              <b>
               International Encyclopedia of Communication
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 302.203 I56e vol. 1-12 (Level B)
               <br />
               In-depth entries on a variety of communication-related topics.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10361264">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10361264">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10361264">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Citation Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10361264">
          <p>
           <strong>
            APA Style
           </strong>
           is typically preferred for media and communication studies, but check with your professor for style requirements and recommendations to be sure.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10361264" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12600141">
              <b>
               Publication Manual of the American Psychological Association (6th ed.)
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Ready Reference 808.06615 P976m 2010 (Level A)
               <br />
               The authoritative and complete manual for APA Style.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25609730">
              <a id="link_25609730" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25609730,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25609730}); ">
               Citation Guides (Muhlenberg College)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Examples of citation formatting in APA, Chicago, and MLA styles.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12600143">
              <a id="link_12600143" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12600143,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Media &amp; Communication Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12373526}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources."  Download instructions and help available on the site.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2926612" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">

             Get Help
            </h2>
